channel.title: Giguer's PVP (My 2nd server release)
channel.description:
I have decided to release this source since I am no longer the coder for it. I thought I would release the work I have done of it.
BTW I HAVE ONLY RELEASED ON HERE AND R-S - ANYWHERE ELSE IS A LEECHER
Credits: Z_B0w_d0wn_Z (Rj), Cammy-PvP, Me, Acme-Scape for client, Some tuts
Features: -100% Perfect Anti-SYI -100% Perfect Anti-Trade Dupe -Anti-Advertisement when they say something such as (ip here).no-ip.biz 3 times they get auto iped. -All working GS specs -All working GS stances -Donator Area -Donor items wield able by only donors -In-Game Hiscores -A lot of shops -95% Barrows -Custom Chaos Ele minigame -1 Wave Jad -PvP shop (Costs pvp points) -2 Skilling areas for skillers -Multipk Area -Custom training area -Random event giving a rare -Home at fally -Working Rune Knives -Chat log added -Proper defense for most items (Skillcapes, bandos, etc. all added) -Plus more!
Pictures: [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/donor.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/armor.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/hiscores.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/pkstore.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/skill1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/skill2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/skillcape.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/train.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/weapons.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/Epiccoloredfires-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/barrows.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/chaosele.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/pvpstore.jpg[/img]
Source: http://www.mediafire.com/?nzmgndngm5z
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?xdmwaizdmu2

item.title: Giguer's PVP (My 2nd server release)
item.dc:creator: @Different1 Different`
item.description:
@Different1 wrote:

[quote=“watch n lern, post:17, topic:326726”][quote author=hawkgames link=topic=423137.msg3113331#msg3113331 date=1264726836]
gona try
[/quote]
Great i hope u like it[/quote]
Everything was good aside from your idea of the max level being 126. You can kill people with one spec on the AGS with 126 strength and being super potted. Terrible idea on your part, it’s an easy fix, but other from that, good server. 4/5

Downloading, my comment will depend on my liking to the player vs player combat. I’ll return to the forum and review the server in about 30 minutes.

item.title: Giguer's PVP (My 2nd server release)
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

mr arrows95:

Great job its a way better sight then all the customs some server’s have[/quote][quote=“marcbob, post:9, topic:326726”]not bad but could use more[/quote][quote=“Guardianman5, post:12, topic:326726”]I like this source alot nice job, but it is a little old, I’m thinking edit it to fit the new generation with a little bit of custom items, and then I think this source would be great, I do Like the originals, but other people enjoy the newer generation with custom items, just my opinion, but GREAT job on this 9/10 and REP++ just for the good job.

thanks for all the positive feedback. Im glad i released

Read full topic
